front.title: A scalable and topology aware MPLS data plane monitoring system

abstract.t: This document describes features of a path monitoring system and a use case. Segment based routing enables a scalable and simple method to monitor data plane liveliness of the complete set of paths belonging to a single domain. The MPLS monitoring system adds to legacy MPLS ping and path trace, it doesn't result in a deprication them. MPLS topology awareness reduces management and control plane involvement of OAM measurements while enabling new OAM features.
